Chat
Trigger.script: -- menu['CHATStab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] ) CHATSWin:raise() name = matches[2] msg = matches[3] CHATSWin:cecho("\n<orange:black>"..name.. ":<green:black>" ..msg) deleteLine() clearTabs() menu['CHATStab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] ) playSoundFile(getMudletHomeDir().. [[/SOUNDS/Beep-2.wav]], 15) alert(5) -- flashes icon

Trigger.name: myChat
Trigger.script: -- menu['CHATStab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] ) CHATSWin:raise() name = "You" msg = matches[2] CHATSWin:cecho("\n<orange:black>"..name.. ":<green:black>" ..msg) deleteLine() clearTabs() menu['CHATStab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] )

Trigger.name: Reply

": " ..msg) deleteLine() clearTabs() menu['TELLStab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] )

Trigger.name: Prompt2
Trigger.script:
deleteLine() hp = matches[2] mhp = matches[3] st = matches[4] mst = matches[5] gld = matches[6] wgt = matches[7] mwgt = matches[8] stat = matches[9] ar = matches[10] dr = matches[11] rm = matches[12] opp = matches[13] --Gauges
hp_bar:setValue(tonumber(hp), tonumber(mhp), "<center>H: " .. hp .. "/" .. mhp); st_bar:setValue(tonumber(st), tonumber(mst), "<center>S: " .. st .. "/" .. mst); -- GUI.Mana:setValue(tonumber(ess), tonumber(mess), "<center>E: " .. ess .. "/" .. mess); clearWindow("INFO2Win") INFO2Win:echo(" 
 Carry: "..wgt.."/"..mwgt) INFO2Win:echo(" 
 Gold: "..gld) INFO2Win:echo(" 
 Status: "..gld) INFO2Win:echo(" 
 AR: "..gld) INFO2Win:echo(" 
 DR: "..gld) INFO2Win:echo(" 
 Room: "..gld) INFO2Win:echo(" 
 Opponent: "..gld)

txt = matches{2} hi = "weapons" setBgColorAll(txt,hi, 255,50,50)
-- Create a trigger to highlight the word "pixie" for us permSubstringTrigger("Highlight stuff", "General", {"pixie"}, [[selectString(line, 1) bg("yellow") resetFormat()]])
-- Or another trigger to highlight several different things permSubstringTrigger("Highlight stuff", "General", {"pixie", "cat", "dog", "rabbit"}, [[selectString(line, 1) fg ("blue") bg("yellow") resetFormat()]])

Trigger.name: AutoPrompt

Alias.name: plague
file1
Alias.script:
home_path = getMudletHomeDir():gsub([[\]], [[/]])
-- This example will work on both Windows and Linux. if io.exists(home_path.."/IMGS/shield.png") then echo("This file exists!") else echo("\nThis file doesn't exist.") end

Alias.name: file2
Alias.script:
home_path = getMudletHomeDir():gsub([[\]], [[/]])
-- fileInfo = lfs.attributes(home_path) fileInfo = lfs.attributes(home_path.."/IMGS/shield.png") if fileInfo then if fileInfo.mode == "directory" then echo("
Path points to a directory.") elseif fileInfo.mode == "file" then echo("
Path points to a file.") else echo("
Path points to: "..fileInfo.mode) end display(fileInfo) -- to see the detailed information else echo("
The path is invalid (file/directory doesn't exist)") end

Alias.name: t1
Alias.script:
time = getTime(true, "hh:mm:ss") echo( "\nTIME: " ..time.."\n")
--Echo the timestamp of the current line in a trigger: --echo(getTimestamp(getLineCount()))

Alias.name: disp
Alias.script: myTable = {} -- create an empty lua table myTable.foo = "Hello there" -- add a text myTable.bar = 23 -- add a number myTable.ubar = function () echo("OK") end -- add more ( func stuff wont display on table) display( myTable ) -- take a look inside the table

Alias.script:
-- doesnt work echoPopup("main","CLICKME", {[[echo "sleep"]], [[echo "sit"]], [[echo "stand"]]}, {"sleepz", "sitz", "standz"})
-- Create some text as a clickable with a popup menu: hinsertPopup("#ff0000activities#r to do", {[[send "sleep"]], [[send "sit"]], [[send "stand"]]}, {"sleep", "sit", "stand"}, true)

Alias.name: atk
Alias.script:
local width, height = getMainWindowSize() createLabel("messageBox",(width/2)-500,(height/2)-100,150,150,1) resizeWindow("messageBox",500,70) moveWindow("messageBox", (width/2)-500,(height/2)-100 ) setBackgroundColor("messageBox", 255, 204, 0, 200) echo("messageBox", [[

You are under attack!

]]) ttsSpeak("You are under attack!")

decho("info2", "<250,50,0:0,155,0>test ish?
") hecho("info1","#ca0004 0 black!") -- send to tell .. click and send to info2 dechoLink("tellWin","
<50,50,0:0,155,0>PRESS me!
", [[info2:echo("
hi")]], "This is a tooltip", true)

Alias.name: tbl test
Alias.script:
-- https://wiki.mudlet.org/w/Manual:Table_Functions testTable = testTable or {}
--it will inserts what inside the variable of matches[2] into at the end of table of 'test_db_name'. --table.insert(test_db_name, matches[2]) --it will inserts other thing at the first position of this table. --table.insert(test_db_name, 1, "jgcampbell300")
testTable = {1,2,"hi","blah",} testString = table.concat(testTable, "
 ") clearWindow("info1") info1:echo(" 
 Inventory: 
 "..testString)

Alias.name: newwin
Alias.script: openUserWindow("My floating window") cecho("My floating window", "<red>hello <blue>bob!")

Alias.name: winsize
Alias.script:
global_width, global_height = getMainWindowSize()
WindowWidth, WindowHeight = getMainWindowSize()
echo("
 
Your Window width is "..WindowWidth.."
 and your window height is "..WindowHeight.."
 
")
echo("
Your global width is "..global_width.."
 and your global height is "..global_height)

Alias.name: talkp
Alias.script:
-- talk deeply first, after 2 seconds talk highly, after 4 seconds normally again ttsSetPitch(-1) ttsQueue("Deep voice")
tempTimer(2, function() ttsSetPitch(1) ttsQueue("High voice") end)
tempTimer(4, function() ttsSetPitch(0) ttsQueue("Normal voice") end)

Alias.name: talkgv
Alias.script:
display(ttsGetVoices())
-- 0 "Microsoft Zira Desktop", -- 1 "Microsoft Hazel Desktop", -- 2 "Microsoft David Desktop"

Alias.name: talk
Alias.script: ttsClearQueue() ttsSpeak("Wow you have been here all day!")

Alias.name: talkr
Alias.script:
-- talk slowly first, after 2 seconds talk quickly, after 4 seconds normally again ttsSetRate(-1) ttsQueue("Slow voice")
tempTimer(2, function () ttsSetRate(1) ttsQueue("Quick voice") end)
tempTimer(4, function () ttsSetRate(0) ttsQueue("Normal voice") end)

Alias.name: talkvol
Alias.script:
-- talk quietly first, after 2 seconds talk a bit louder, after 4 seconds normally again ttsSetVolume(0.2) ttsSpeak("Quiet voice")
tempTimer(2, function () ttsSetVolume(0.5) ttsSpeak("Low voice") end)
tempTimer(4, function () ttsSetVolume(1) ttsSpeak("Normal voice") end)

Script.name: Main border
Script.script: local w,h = getMainWindowSize() setBorderTop(h/55) setBorderBottom(h/10) setBorderLeft(w/28) setBorderRight(w/2.68) setBorderColor(60, 60, 60)

Script.name: Containers
Footer Icons
Script.script:
GUI_Footer = Geyser.HBox:new({ name = "GUI_Footer", x = "0.5%", y = "2%", width = "100%", height = "82%", },bottom_container)
home_path = getMudletHomeDir():gsub([[\]], [[/]])
-- ====================== btn = btn or { state = {"ON","OFF"}, } btn.curr = btn.curr or btn.state[2] -- OFF GUI = GUI or {}
-- ---------------------------
for i = 1,12 do GUI["Icon_"..i] = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "GUI.Icon_"..i, },GUI_Footer)
GUI["Icon_"..i]:setStyleSheet([[ color: cyan; background-color: rgba(0,0,0,0%); border: 3px solid rgba(0,0,0,100%); border-image: none 100% 1 0 stretch;
]])
GUI["Icon_"..i]:setClickCallback("on_click", GUI["Icon_"..i] ) GUI["Icon_"..i]:setOnEnter("onenter", GUI["Icon_"..i]) GUI["Icon_"..i]:setOnLeave("onleave", GUI["Icon_"..i]) --GUI["Icon_"..i].state = "OFF" end -- ========================== setIcons() bkgcol = "black" txtcol = "cyan"
function on_click( icon ) -- echo("\n" ..icon)
if icon.name == "GUI.Icon_1" then echo("\n" ..icon.." all others off...")
elseif icon.name == "GUI.Icon_2" then
elseif icon.name == "GUI.Icon_13" then
elseif icon == "GUI.Icon_4" then
elseif icon.name == "GUI.Icon_5" then
elseif icon.name == "GUI.Icon_6" then
elseif icon.name == "GUI.Icon_7" then
elseif icon.name == "GUI.Icon_8" then
elseif icon.name == "GUI.Icon_9" then expandAlias("tpt") -- =============================================
elseif icon.name == "GUI.Icon_10" then toggle = not toggle
icon.state = toggle state = tostring(icon.state) if toggle then echo("\nDisabling Trades") disableTrigger("TRADES") --icon:setFgColor( 255, 165, 0) icon:setFgColor( "orange") else echo("\nEnabling Trades") enableTrigger("TRADES") -- icon:setFgColor( 0,255,255) icon:setFgColor( "cyan") end
-- ====================================================
elseif icon.name == "GUI.Icon_11" then echo(" do another alias here") --send( [[homedir ]] ) expandAlias("homedir") -- you can clear a window each time too! clearWindow("info1") info1:echo(" \n Inventory: from a variable here?")
elseif icon.name == "GUI.Icon_12" then send("pray divinepath Ancient Cypress Canopy") --info2:echo(" \n Posture: from a button?") end end -- end of function -- -----------------------
function onenter(icon) icon:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: black; border: 3px solid rgba(0,0,0,100%); border-image: none 100% 1 0 stretch; ]] ) end
function onleave(icon) if( icon.state == true) then bkgcol = "dimgrey" else bkgcol = "rgba(0,0,0,0%)" end
icon:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: ]]..bkgcol.. [[ ; border: 3px solid rgba(0,0,0,100%); border-image: none 100% 1 0 stretch; ]] )
end
-- ----------------------------

Script.name: Tabs
Script.script:
menu = menu or { tabs = {"CHATS","TELLS","ARRIVALS"}, colorR = "rgb(75,0,130)", colorG = "rgb(100,150,100)", colorB = "rgb(100,100,150)", color4 = "rgb(60,60,60)", width = "20%", height = "40%", } -- menu.current empty for now ( till called?) menu.current = menu.current or menu.tabs[1] menu.old = menu.old or menu.tabs[1]
-- ---------------------------- cTab = cTab or menu.tabs[1] tTab = tTab or menu.tabs[2] aTab = aTab or menu.tabs[3]
-- --------- header for tabs--------------
menu.header = Geyser.HBox:new({ name = "menu.header", x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "10%", },right_container_top)
-- ---------Footer for content-----------------
menu.footer = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "menu.footer", x = "0%", y = "10%", width = "100%", height = "91.5%", },right_container_top) -- --------------------
menu.footer:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: ]]..menu.colorR..[[; border-bottom-left-radius: 10px; border-bottom-right-radius: 10px; ]]) -- ---------------------------------
-- ---------------------------- -- ========================================================
for k,v in pairs(menu.tabs) do
menu[v.."tab"] = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "menu."..v.."tab", },menu.header) -- ---------------------------
menu[v.."tab"]:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: ]]..menu.color4..[[; margin-right: 1px; margin-left: 1px; ]]) -- -------------------- -- give tabs text and callback
menu[v.."tab"]:echo("<center>"..v) menu[v.."tab"]:setClickCallback("menu.click",v) menu[v.."tab"]:setOnEnter("menu.onenter",v) menu[v.."tab"]:setOnLeave("menu.onleave",v)
-- --------- BACKGROUNDS---------------------
-- menu[v]:hide()
end -- =================================
-- chat tab set to green to begin with menu[menu.current..'tab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] )
-- ==============================================
function menu.click(tab) clearTabs() menu.current = tab
if( tab == "CHATS") then chatWin:raise() menu['CHATStab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] ) end if( tab == "TELLS") then tellWin:raise() menu['TELLStab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] ) end if( tab == "ARRIVALS") then arvWin:raise() menu['ARRIVALStab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] ) end -- ----------------------------
-- menu.old = menu.current -- menu[menu.old..'tab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: ]]..menu.color4..[[ ]] ) -- menu.current = tab
-- echo(" got "..tab) -- menu[menu.current..'tab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] ) -- menu[menu.current]:show()
end -- ------------------------
function menu.onenter(tab) menu[tab.."tab"]:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: orange]] ) end
function menu.onleave(tab) menu[tab.."tab"]:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: ]]..menu.color4..[[ ]] ) menu[menu.current..'tab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] ) end

Script.name: Tells MiniWindows
Script.script:
chatWin = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="chatWin", x="1%", y="1%", autoWrap = true, color = "cyan", scrollBar = true, fontSize = 10, width="98%", height="98%", }, menu.footer)
chatWin:setColor(0,0,0) clearWindow("chatWin") resetFormat() chatWin:raise() --============================
tellWin = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="tellWin", x="1%", y="1%", autoWrap = true, color = "cyan", scrollBar = true, fontSize = 10, width="98%", height="98%", }, menu.footer)
tellWin:setColor(0,0,0) clearWindow("tellWin") resetFormat() -- tellWin:raise() -- ====================
arvWin = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="arvWin", x="1%", y="1%", autoWrap = true, color = "cyan", scrollBar = true, fontSize = 10, width="98%", height="98%", }, menu.footer)
arvWin:setColor(0,0,0) clearWindow("arvWin") resetFormat() -- arvWin:raise()

Script.name: clearTabs
gauge01
Icon names
Script.script:
function setIcons() head = string.format( [[

]]) tail = string.format( [[

]]) GUI.Icon_1:echo(head.."CON"..tail) GUI.Icon_2:echo(head.."FIREBALL"..tail) GUI.Icon_3:echo(head.."GETALL"..tail) GUI.Icon_4:echo(head.."ANALYZ"..tail) GUI.Icon_5:echo(head.."SLAP"..tail) GUI.Icon_6:echo(head.."GROUP"..tail) GUI.Icon_7:echo(head.."KILLZEL"..tail) GUI.Icon_8:echo(head.."THINK"..tail) GUI.Icon_9:echo(head.."TP-trd"..tail) GUI.Icon_10:echo(head.."Trades"..tail) GUI.Icon_11:echo(head.."HomeDir"..tail) GUI.Icon_12:echo(head.."TP"..tail) end

Script.name: Tabs 2
Script.script:
menu2 = menu2 or { tabs = {"INFO1","INFO2","INFO3"}, colorR = "rgb(75,0,130)", colorG = "rgb(100,150,100)", colorB = "rgb(100,100,150)", color4 = "rgb(60,60,60)", width = "20%", height = "40%", } -- menu2.current empty for now ( till called?) menu2.current = menu2.current or menu2.tabs[1] menu2.old = menu2.old or menu2.tabs[1]
-- ----------------------------
xTab = xTab or menu2.tabs[1] yTab = yTab or menu2.tabs[2] zTab = zTab or menu2.tabs[3]
-- --------- header for tabs--------------
menu2.header = Geyser.HBox:new({ name = "menu2.header", x = "0%", y = "0%", width = "100%", height = "10%", },right_container_bottom)
-- ---------Footer for content-----------------
menu2.footer = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "menu2.footer", x = "0%", y = "10%", width = "100%", height = "68%", },right_container_bottom) -- --------------------
menu2.footer:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: ]]..menu2.colorR..[[; border-bottom-left-radius: 10px; border-bottom-right-radius: 10px; ]]) -- ---------------------------------
-- ---------------------------- -- ========================================================
for k,v in pairs(menu2.tabs) do
menu2[v.."tab"] = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "menu2."..v.."tab", },menu2.header) -- ---------------------------
menu2[v.."tab"]:setStyleSheet([[ background-color: ]]..menu2.color4..[[; margin-right: 1px; margin-left: 1px; ]]) -- -------------------- -- give tabs text and callback
menu2[v.."tab"]:echo("<center>"..v) menu2[v.."tab"]:setClickCallback("menu2.click",v) menu2[v.."tab"]:setOnEnter("menu2.onenter",v) menu2[v.."tab"]:setOnLeave("menu2.onleave",v)
-- --------- BACKGROUNDS---------------------
-- menu2[v]:hide()
end -- =================================
-- chat tab set to blue to begin with menu2[menu2.current..'tab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] )
-- ==============================================
function menu2.click(tab2) clearTabs2() menu2.current = tab2
if( tab2 == "INFO1") then INFO1Win:raise() menu2['INFO1tab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] ) end if( tab2 == "INFO2") then INFO2Win:raise() menu2['INFO2tab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] ) end if( tab2 == "INFO3") then INFO3Win:raise() menu2['INFO3tab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] ) end -- ----------------------------
-- menu.old = menu.current -- menu[menu.old..'tab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: ]]..menu.color4..[[ ]] ) -- menu.current = tab
-- echo(" got "..tab) -- menu[menu.current..'tab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] ) -- menu[menu.current]:show()
end -- ------------------------
function menu2.onenter(tab2) menu2[tab2.."tab"]:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: orange]] ) end
function menu2.onleave(tab2) menu2[tab2.."tab"]:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: ]]..menu.color4..[[ ]] ) menu2[menu2.current..'tab']:setStyleSheet( [[ background-color: steelblue ]] ) end

Script.name: Infos MiniWindows
Script.script:
INFO1Win = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="INFO1Win", x="1%", y="2%", autoWrap = true, color = "cyan", scrollBar = false, fontSize = 10, width="98%", height="95%", }, menu2.footer)
INFO1Win:setColor(20,20,20) clearWindow("INFO1Win") resetFormat() INFO1Win:raise() --============================
INFO2Win = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="INFO2Win", x="1%", y="2%", autoWrap = true, color = "cyan", scrollBar = false, fontSize = 10, width="98%", height="95%", }, menu2.footer)
INFO2Win:setColor(20,20,20) clearWindow("INFO2Win") resetFormat() -- INFO2Win:raise() -- ====================
INFO3Win = Geyser.MiniConsole:new({ name="INFO3Win", x="1%", y="2%", autoWrap = true, color = "cyan", scrollBar = false, fontSize = 10, width="98%", height="95%", }, menu2.footer)
INFO3Win:setColor(20,20,20) clearWindow("INFO3Win") resetFormat() -- INFO3Win:raise()

Script.name: ComWindows
Script.script: comWins = {"COMS","TELLS","ARRIVALS"}

Script.name: handleGroups
Script.script:
login_data = login_data or {}
-- ================
if io.exists(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/login_data.lua") and table.is_empty(login_data) then table.load(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/login_data.lua", login_data) end
-- =========================================
function acctSwitch(current)
if exists(current, "alias") == 0 then permGroup(current, "alias", "Characters") end
if exists(current, "trigger") == 0 then permGroup(current, "trigger", "Characters") end
-- turn off all character groups for k,v in ipairs(login_data) do name = string.format(v.a_name ) disableTrigger(name) disableAlias(name) end
INFO1Win:echo("\n Loading Triggers... " ..char) enableTrigger(current) INFO1Win:echo("\n Loading Aliases.... " ..char) enableAlias(current)
tempTimer(4, [[ clearWindow("INFO1Win"); INFO1Win:cecho("\n<orange:black>Ready...") ]] )
end

Script.name: showDB
Script.script: function showdb() for k,v in ipairs(login_data) do lognm = string.format(v.a_name ) INFO2Win:echo( " val: " ..lognm.."\n" ) end end

Script.name: Init
loadTable
Script.script: login_data = login_data or {} if io.exists(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/login_data.lua") and table.is_empty(login_data) then table.load(getMudletHomeDir() .. "/login_data.lua", login_data) end

Script.name: set bg highlight
Script.script: function setBgColorAll( word, r, g, b ) i = 0 word_count = 1 while i > -1 do i = selectString(word, word_count) if i == -1 then return end word_count = word_count +1 setBgColor( r, g, b ) end end

Script.name: sysreg event
style change
Script.script: registerAnonymousEventHandler("ssheetcheck", "appStyleSheetChangeEvent") raiseEvent("ssheetcheck", "sum arg")

Script.name: Init
Script.script:
home_path = getMudletHomeDir():gsub([[\]], [[/]])  
	echo("
 
 Initializing....
Home Directory: "..home_path.."
")
